means: 值得，应获得( merit的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He claims that their success was not merited.
sentence.Network_cn: 他声称他们不应该获得成功。

sentence.Network_en: Lowell , who succeeded him in the chair , also merited the appointment.
sentence.Network_cn: 接替他出任这个教职的洛威尔也极其称职.

sentence.Network_en: Raise your standards , my brave men, and set neither measure nor limit to your merited rage.
sentence.Network_cn: 勇士们, 高举战旗,奋勇前进吧!

PerfectNetExp.abs: merit 优点merited 应得的meritocracy 知识界精华
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... merit 值得 merited 该得的，理所当然的 meritorious 值得赞赏的.
That brave deed merited a better reward ., 这种勇敢的行为应该得到更好的奖赏.

英语单词merit... ... relative merits 优缺点 scale merit (集成度的)规模指标; 刻度标准; 标度优值 second-class merit 二等功.

entry.def: If something has merit, it has good or worthwhile qualities.

example.ex: The  argument seemed to have considerable merit...
example.tran: 这个论点似乎颇有价值。

example.ex: Box-office success mattered more than artistic merit...
example.tran: 票房上的成功比艺术价值更重要。

entry.def: The merits of something are its advantages or other good  points.

example.ex: They have been persuaded of the merits of peace.
example.tran: 他们被劝服，认识到了和平的好处。
一部电影技术上的长处

entry.def: If someone or something merits a particular action or treatment, they deserve it.

example.ex: He said he had done nothing wrong to merit a criminal investigation...
example.tran: 他说自己没有干坏事，不应该受到刑事调查。

entry.tran: 根据事物本身的情况(来评价)
entry.def: If you judge something or someone on merit or on their merits, your judgment is based on what you notice when you consider them, rather than on things that you know about them from other sources.

example.tran: 每个人都是凭个人才能入选的。

example.ex: Each case is judged on its merits.
example.tran: 每个案件都是按照案件本身的特点判定的。

auth_sentence.content: The prosecutor argued that the crime merited prison time.
auth_sentence.res_content: The prosecutor argued that the crime merited prison time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The prosecutor argued that the crime merited prison time.

auth_sentence.content: Yet a statement from the watchdog is surely merited.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet a statement from the watchdog is surely merited.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet a statement from the watchdog is surely merited.

auth_sentence.content: The performance as a whole merited the victory.
auth_sentence.res_content: The performance as a whole merited the victory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The performance as a whole merited the victory.
